summary: Completed comprehensive testing of EcoPulse NGO Sustainability Platform - backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working with minor authentication persistence issues

integration_issues.issue: User gets logged out between page navigations, requiring re-authentication

passed_tests: User login with JWT token generation
Travel activity creation with auto carbon calculation (5.25 kg CO2 for 50km petrol car with 2 passengers)
Staff welfare activity creation with auto carbon calculation (25.0 kg CO2 for gym membership for 5 people)
Energy data creation with auto carbon calculation (75.25 kg CO2 for 150.5 kWh)
Goal creation for emission reduction targets
Dashboard statistics endpoint returning proper metrics
AI insights generation with GPT-5.2 recommendations
Landing page loads correctly with hero section and features
Dashboard displays stats and charts correctly
Activity tracking dialog opens and form fields work

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (UI loads correctly, forms work, minor session issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix user session persistence issue - users are getting logged out between page navigations. Consider implementing proper token refresh mechanism or checking localStorage token handling.
